name: spreadsheet-language
description: The scripting language which powers the Obsidian Spreadsheet tool

scripts.build:package.json: cat package.json | jq -r '. *  .deploy * {deploy:null} | with_entries(select(.value |. != null))' > build/package.json
scripts.build: cat package.json | jq -r '.scripts | keys_unsorted[] | select(. | startswith("build:"))' | xargs -d \\n -I {} $npm_execpath run {}
